summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented in BenefitsSection.tsx by changing the benefit title to "Sustainable" and applying justified alignment to the benefit description paragraph. However, additional non-requested modifications were made to project metadata/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive content in frontend-file-summaries.txt unrelated to the requested Benefits card label/alignment change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to change one Benefits card title and justify the benefit descriptions within a specific element; it does not request updating summary/metadata documentation files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json (e.g., adding new_feature_requests entries / statuses).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating project tracking/state files; it only specifies frontend UI text/alignment changes.
